description: You have ascended in power and can rival the mighty night-creatures of old.

//: Lilin are spiritual vampires--rather than feed on blood, they feed on the essence of their targets.  This allows them to gain some similar powers to vampires, but often in a more subtle fashion
description:
You are one of the lilin, a hunter in the night, driven to feed on the spiritual essense (some might say the soul) of your prey.  Probably you were born that way, but maybe it happened to due to a malediction, or some artifact you found in a place best forgotten.  Regardless, it is your gift and your curse now, and you must use your powers to survive.

You may activate this trait to spend some ruach toward increasing your power.  You must be outside under the moon to have a chance of gaining new lilin powers.
With but a touch, you can drain the vitality and spiritual essence from your targets.

name.//~: Ruach is the Hebrew word for 'breath,' but it can also mean 'spirit'

description: You no longer need to touch your targets to drain their ruach; you can do it at a distance through their breath.
